critique: The document aims to address urban decay and promote orderly growth. The primary emotions the President wants to elicit are joy (through improved living standards), and a sense of reduced fear and sadness (by addressing urban problems). There's also an element of surprise intended, as the order signifies a proactive approach to urban development. Disgust and anger are less relevant here, as the document focuses on solutions rather than dwelling on negative aspects. The initial scores reflect this assessment.
